item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge in Bartlett, NH the weekend of January 21-23rd for what is one of the sickest weekends of the year! The lodge is filling up fast so if you haven't made it up yet and have been thinking about it this might be the time to come up. For this particular weekend we are only accepting RSVPs for people who can stay 2 nights.

We are located only 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Cranmore, Black, and Bretton Woods right in the heart of North Conway and about 40 minutes from Sunday River.

Lodging is $20/night and we are offering a dinner (optional) on Saturday night consisting of a meat and a veggie option with soup and dessert. The charge for dinner including dessert will be $15.

Full directions and information will be provided to those who RSVP.

Sign up soon!
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts January 21-23: The cure for what ails you
